welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Monnickendam! This charming city on the shores of the Markermeer is known for its picturesque canals, historic buildings, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that Monnickendam has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Schiphol Airport, dedicated to long-haul and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with limited access to certain websites and services.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Soesterberg Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Soesterberg Air Base Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
